whatIsSwipeScout.question: What is SwipeScout?
whatIsSwipeScout.answer: SwipeScout is a modern recruitment platform that connects job seekers with employers through video profiles and AI-powered matching. We make hiring more personal and efficient.

createVideoResume.question: How do I create a video resume?
createVideoResume.answer: Navigate to your profile and click "Create Video Resume". You can record directly or upload a 45-second video showcasing your skills and personality.

videoVisibility.question: Is my video resume publicly visible?
videoVisibility.answer: You control visibility in Settings. Choose between public, only to employers you apply to, or private until you activate it.

jobPostingCost.question: How much does it cost to post jobs?
jobPostingCost.answer: We offer free basic listings. Premium plans with advanced features start at $99/month. Volume discounts available for enterprise clients.

videoFormats.question: What video formats are supported?
videoFormats.answer: We support MP4, MOV, and WebM formats up to 100MB. Recommended resolution is 1080p (1920x1080) for optimal quality.

uploadFailing.question: Why is my video upload failing?
uploadFailing.answer: Check file size (<100MB), format, and internet connection. If issues persist, try compressing your video or contact support.

howMatching.question: How does matching work?
howMatching.answer: Our AI analyzes job requirements and candidate profiles to suggest the best matches. Employers and candidates can then connect directly.

searchCandidates.question: Can I search candidates by skills?
searchCandidates.answer: Yes! Use our advanced search filters to find candidates by skills, experience level, location, and more.
